name: Space Shooter (itch) (Dawson Pike)
description:
A simple Asteroids-clone where you fly around an asteroid field, shooting at them and collecting Ore to score points. First Godot project I made, and not a very good one. Just a decent enough demonstration of skill to add to my portfolio.

Art assets made in Paint.net

Kirifont made by Dalton 5000 from their Godot Font Pack

Recommended to play in fullscreen

Controls:

Up Arrow: Accelerate

Down Arrow: Decelerate

L/R Arrow: Turn ccw/cw

Q/Z: Adjust acceleration rate

W/X: Adjust turn rate

F: Fire laser
